transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another, using an allowance mechanism.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a given address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

changeAdmin.description: Changes the admin of the contract.

AdminChanged.description: Emitted when the admin address changes.

Upgraded.description: Emitted when the contract is upgraded to a new implementation.
